author: Chris Roling
title: WWE WrestleMania Rumors: Reviewing Top Buzz Ahead of Historic 2-Night PPV
description: WrestleMania 36 might be unorthodox, and some of it might be taped, yes.    But those factors won't stop the rumor mill.    The biggest event on WWE's calendar is not only going to be hosted by Rob Gronkowski but also split into two nights...
content:
Jae C. Hong/Associated Press
WrestleMania 36 might be unorthodox, and some of it might be taped, yes.
But those factors won't stop the rumor mill.
The biggest event on WWE's calendar is not only going to be hosted by Rob Gronkowski but also split into two … [+3459 chars]
